data.name: Error_Already_TableCloth_Running
data.value: The TableCloth program is already running.

data.name: Error_Cannot_CopyToClipboard
data.value: The data could not be copied because the clipboard was not ready.

data.name: Error_Cannot_Create_AppDataDirectory
data.value: Failed to create a directory for storing application data.

data.name: Error_Cannot_Download_Catalog
data.value: The catalog file was not downloaded.

data.name: Error_Cannot_Find_CertFile
data.value: The certificate information file (.der) file was not found.

data.name: Error_Cannot_Find_KeyFile
data.value: The certificate private key file (.key) file was not found.

data.name: Error_Cannot_Find_PfxFile
data.value: The certificate file (.pfx or .p12) file was not found.

data.name: Error_Cannot_Invoke_GetProductInfo
data.value: The application called the Windows OS product information lookup API, but was unable to get the information.

data.name: Error_Cannot_Invoke_GetVersionEx
data.value: The call to the Get Windows OS version information API failed with the following error code - {0:X8}

data.name: Error_Cannot_Obtain_Assembly
data.value: Unable to get assembly information.

data.name: Error_Cannot_Prepare_AppContents
data.value: The application content creation task failed.

data.name: Error_Cannot_Run_SysInfo
data.value: The application can't run the System Information utility.

data.name: Error_CatalogDeserilizationFailure
data.value: The format of the Catalog.xml file seems to be different from what the program expects.
data.comment: This item is used by Spork.

data.name: Error_CatalogLoadFailure
data.value: The program can't proceed with the installation because the Catalog.xml file can't be loaded from a remote website.
data.comment: This item is used by Spork.

data.name: Error_Cert_Expired
data.value: The certificate you selected has expired. You'll need to select a different public certificate, or replace it with a new public certificate.

data.name: Error_Cert_ExpireSoon
data.value: Expires in {0} days. It needs to be replaced with a new certificate.

data.name: Error_Cert_MayTooEarly
data.value: The certificate you selected will be available in {0} days.

data.name: Error_CommandLineInterpreter_Missing
data.value: Windows Command Line Interpreter (cmd.exe) could not be found.

data.name: Error_Fail_PrepareAssetDirectory
data.value: Failed to prepare a directory to store data files for use inside the sandbox.

data.name: Error_FileLineNo
data.value: (File: {0} (Row: {1}), Member: {2})

data.name: Error_ForYourReference
data.value: For reference, here's the error occurred - {0}

data.name: Error_Spork_Missing
data.value: The spork executable file was not found, please reinstall the program.

data.name: Error_HostFolder_Unavailable
data.value: The following directories are not found on this computer and will not be mounted when connecting from the sandbox.

data.name: Error_HyperVisor_Missing
data.value: Unable to confirm support for system virtualization features, Windows Sandbox may not run properly.

data.name: Error_IEMode_NotAvailable
data.value: Internet Explorer mode must be enabled within the Microsoft Edge browser to avoid compatibility issues. Please enable Internet Explorer via Add/Remove System Components.

data.name: Error_Images_Missing
data.value: The default image and icon resource files were not found, please reinstall the program.

data.name: Error_No_WindowsPowerShell
data.value: The installation script could not be run because the Windows PowerShell executable file was not found.

data.name: Error_Offline
data.value: It looks like your system is not connected to the internet, please connect to the internet and run the TableCloth program again for full functionality.

data.name: Error_OpenDerAndKey_Simultaneously
data.value:
Select one certificate information file (DER) and one certificate private key file (KEY).
You can select multiple files by holding down the Ctrl or Shift key, or by dragging an empty space in the file selection window.

data.name: Error_Package_CanNotStart
data.value: The package installer failed to start.
data.comment: This item is used by Spork.

data.name: Error_Restart_And_RunAgain
data.value: After installing Windows Sandbox, you may need to restart your system. If necessary, restart your system and run TableCloth again.

data.name: Error_SandboxMightNotAvailable
data.value: Based on the product information retrieved, it appears that you are using a version of the operating system that does not support the Windows Sandbox feature.

data.name: Error_ShortcutFailed
data.value: Shortcut creation failed.

data.name: Error_ShortcutNoSiteSelected
data.value: You can't create a shortcut because there is no website selected.

data.name: Error_StSessConfig_CanNotStart
data.value: The application can't run the AhnLab Safe Transaction configuration utility.
data.comment: This item is used by Spork.

data.name: Error_Unknown
data.value: An unexpected error occurred: (File: {0} (Row: {1}), Member: {2})

data.name: Error_Windows_Dism_Missing
data.value: TableCloth can't proceed with the Windows Sandbox installation surrogate because the DISM.exe utility was not found. You can try enabling Windows Sandbox in Turn Windows Features On/Off.

data.name: Error_Windows_Explorer_CanNotStart
data.value: The application can't start the Windows Explorer program.

data.name: Error_Windows_Explorer_Missing
data.value: The Windows Explorer program was not found.

data.name: Error_Windows_OS_Too_Old
data.value: The operating system you are running appears to be an older version of an operating system that does not support the Windows Sandbox feature. Please upgrade to Windows 10 or later.

data.name: Error_Windows_Sandbox_Already_Running
data.value: It looks like you're running Windows Sandbox through the TableCloth, please exit Windows Sandbox first when you're done using it.

data.name: Error_Windows_Sandbox_CanNotStart
data.value: Failed to run the sandbox program.

data.name: Error_Windows_Sandbox_Missing
data.value: It looks like you don't have Windows Sandbox installed! Please enable Windows Sandbox in Turn Windows Features On/Off.

data.name: Error_X509CertError
data.value: An X509 certificate error occurred during communication with a remote website. The certificate subject is {0}, and the error code encountered is {1}.
data.comment: This item is used by Spork.

data.name: Error_HelpSwitch_NotFound
data.value: Unexpected Error: Cannot find help switch from command line parser configuration.

data.name: Error_VersionSwitch_NotFound
data.value: Unexpected Error: Cannot find version switch from command line parser configuration.

data.name: Error_SystemDrive_Vulnerable
data.value:
The drive where Windows Sandbox will run does not appear to be protected by BitLocker.
If the device or disk is stolen, forensics may reveal sensitive data, so be sure to turn on BitLocker protection before continuing to run TableCloth.

data.name: Error_Sponge_Missing
data.value: The sponge executable file was not found, please reinstall the program.
